title: Cloud Natural Language - ClassificationCategory
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - ClassificationCategory
- [JSON representation](#SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) Represents a category returned from the text classifier.| JSON representation      |
|:-------------------------------------------|
| { "name": string, "confidence": number } || Fields  | Fields.1                                   |
|:-----------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| name  | string The name of the category representing the document.                      |
| confidence | number The classifier's confidence of the category. Number represents how certain the classifier is that this category represents the given text.
